meanings.sent1: The wind disseminates seeds across the field.
meanings.sent2: The teacher disseminates knowledge to her students.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel disseminates acorns all over the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter disseminates joy throughout the room.
meanings.sent5: The rumor quickly disseminates through the small town.

meanings.sent1: The farmer disseminates fertilizer on the crops.
meanings.sent2: The company disseminates flyers to promote their new product.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy disseminates toys all around the house.
meanings.sent4: His speech disseminates hope to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The artist's work disseminates beauty to all who see it.
